DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numeric value for the GPA Score.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A prognostic index for patients with brain metastases. The GPA incorporates age, Karnofsky performance status, number of extracranial metastases, and number of brain metastases._A numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number; a number used to select an element of a list, vector, array or other sequence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A prognostic index for patients with brain metastases. The GPA incorporates age, Karnofsky performance status, number of extracranial metastases, and number of brain metastases.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.
